name: Cook something
desc: You can stay inside and cook something delicious!

name: Have a bonfire
desc: You can have a bonfire with some friends outside!

name: Have a picnic
desc: You can enjoy some food outside with a picnic, sit down under a shady tree and dig in!

name: Go swimming

img.alt: A picture of a body of water

desc: Cool off outside by jumping into some water and going for a swim!

name: Play a board game
desc: You could do a board game or a puzzle if you want to stay indoors! You can do this alone or with others

name: Bake some cookies

img.alt: Picture of some freshly baked cookies

desc: You could can bake some cookies inside! You might want to do this one alone so you can eat all the cookies!

name: Go for a hike
desc: Enjoy some exercise outdoors with some friends or by yourself! You can do this rain or shine, but remember a rain jacket if the weather looks bad!
